storage

Class ConfigSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • storage.ConfigSaver

  • public class ConfigSaver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class saves the configuration to a file by closing the tool; and loads it back at a new start of the tool. The configuration save and load is initiated by the controller. Especially the information with modules ares selected and unselected will be saved.
    See Also:
    ExtractionController
